verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> Gershon קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> and Merari
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> Amram יִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> and Uzziel ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children עַמְרָ֔ם <WH6019> of Amram אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> and Moses וּמִרְיָ֑ם <WH4813> and Miriam ס וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> also of Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> and Ithamar ס
אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> Eleazar הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> פִּֽינְחָ֔ס <WH6372> Phinehas פִּֽינְחָ֖ס <WH6372> Phinehas הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישֽׁוּעַ׃ <WH50> Abishua
וַאֲבִישׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH50> And Abishua הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בֻּקִּ֔י <WH1231> Bukki וּבֻקִּ֖י <WH1231> and Bukki הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֻזִּֽי׃ <WH5813> Uzzi
וְעֻזִּי֙ <WH5813> And Uzzi הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> זְרַֽחְיָ֔ה <WH2228> Zerahiah וּֽזְרַֽחְיָ֖ה <WH2228> and Zerahiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מְרָיֽוֹת׃ <WH4812> Meraioth
מְרָיוֹת֙ <WH4812> Meraioth הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמַרְיָ֔ה <WH568> Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <WH285> Ahitub
וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <WH285> And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִימָֽעַץ׃ <WH290> Ahimaaz
וַאֲחִימַ֙עַץ֙ <WH290> And Ahimaaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזַרְיָ֔ה <WH5838> Azariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> and Azariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹחָנָֽן׃ <WH3110> Johanan

וְיוֹחָנָ֖ן <WH3110> And Johanan הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזַרְיָ֑ה <WH5838> Azariah ה֚וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who כִּהֵ֔ן <WH3547> (he [it is] that executed the priest's office בַּבַּ֕יִת <WH1004> in the temple אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> that Solomon בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem
וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> begat עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> And Azariah אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמַרְיָ֑ה <WH568> Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <WH285> Ahitub
וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <WH285> And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <WH6659> and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <WH7967> Shallum
וְשַׁלּוּם֙ <WH7967> And Shallum הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> חִלְקִיָּ֔ה <WH2518> Hilkiah וְחִלְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2518> and Hilkiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> Azariah
וַעֲזַרְיָה֙ <WH5838> And Azariah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂרָיָ֔ה <WH8304> Seraiah וּשְׂרָיָ֖ה <WH8304> and Seraiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹצָדָֽק׃ <WH3087> Jehozadak

וִיהוֹצָדָ֣ק <WH3087> And Jehozadak הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> went בְּהַגְל֣וֹת <WH1540> carried away יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [into captivity] when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by the hand נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּֽר׃ <WH5019> of Nebuchadnezzar ס
בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi גֵּרְשֹׁ֕ם <WH1647> Gershom קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> and Merari
וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> And these [be] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <WH1647> of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> Libni וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> and Shimei
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> [were] Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> and Uzziel

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> Mahli וּמֻשִׁ֑י <WH4187> and Mushi וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> and these מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> And these [are] the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> of the Levites לַאֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> according to their fathers
לְֽגֵרְשׁ֑וֹם <WH1647> Of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> Libni בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son יַ֥חַת <WH3189> Jahath בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son זִמָּ֥ה <WH2155> Zimmah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
יוֹאָ֤ח <WH3098> Joah בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son עִדּ֣וֹ <WH5714> Iddo בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son זֶ֥רַח <WH2226> Zerah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son יְאָתְרַ֥י <WH2979> Jeaterai בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> of Kohath עַמִּינָדָ֣ב <WH5992> Amminadab בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Korah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אַסִּ֥יר <WH617> Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <WH511> Elkanah בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son וְאֶבְיָסָ֥ף <WH43> and Ebiasaph בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son וְאַסִּ֥יר <WH617> and Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

תַּ֤חַת <WH8480> Tahath בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> his son אוּרִיאֵ֣ל <WH222> Uriel בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <WH5818> Uzziah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son וְשָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> and Shaul בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> And the sons אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> of Elkanah עֲמָשַׂ֖י <WH6022> Amasai וַאֲחִימֽוֹת׃ <WH287> and Ahimoth

אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <WH511> [As for] Elkanah [בְּנֹו כ] (בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> his son ק) אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> of Elkanah צוֹפַ֥י <WH6689> Zophai בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> the sons וְנַ֥חַת <WH5184> and Nahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
אֱלִיאָ֥ב <WH446> Eliab בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son יְרֹחָ֥ם <WH3395> Jeroham בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <WH511> Elkanah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> And the sons שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> of Samuel הַבְּכֹ֥ר <WH1060> the firstborn וַשְׁנִ֖י <WH2059> Vashni וַאֲבִיָּֽה׃ <WH29> and Abiah ס

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> of Merari מַחְלִ֑י <WH4249> Mahli לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> Libni בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> Shimei בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son עֻזָּ֥ה <WH5798> Uzza בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
שִׁמְעָ֥א <WH8092> Shimea בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son חַגִּיָּ֥ה <WH2293> Haggiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> Asaiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son פ

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> now these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הֶעֱמִ֥יד <WH5975> set דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And these [are they] whom David עַל־ <WH5921> over יְדֵי־ <WH3027> over the service שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> of song בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִמְּנ֖וֹחַ <WH4494> had rest הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> after that the ark

וַיִּהְי֨וּ <WH1961> become מְשָׁרְתִ֜ים <WH8334> And they ministered לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <WH4908> the dwelling אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> place of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation בַּשִּׁ֔יר <WH7892> with singing עַד־ <WH5704> until בְּנ֧וֹת <WH1129> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> until Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וַיַּעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> and [then] they waited כְמִשְׁפָּטָ֖ם <WH4941> according to their order עַל־ <WH5921> according עֲבוֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> on their office

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> And these [are] they that waited וּבְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1121> with their children מִבְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> Of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֔י <WH6956> of the Kohathites הֵימָן֙ <WH1968> Heman הַמְשׁוֹרֵ֔ר <WH7891> a singer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> of Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> of Shemuel

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <WH511> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֱלִיאֵ֖ל <WH447> of Eliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son תּֽוֹחַ׃ <WH8430> of Toah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son [צִיף כ] (צוּף֙ <WH6689> Zophai ק) בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַ֖חַת <WH4287> of Mahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲמָשָֽׂי׃ <WH6022> of Amasai

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <WH511> of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאֵ֔ל <WH3100> of Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> of Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְפַנְיָֽה׃ <WH6846> of Zephaniah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son תַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8480> of Tahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַסִּ֔יר <WH617> of Assir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶבְיָסָ֖ף <WH43> of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> of Korah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son יִצְהָ֣ר <WH3324> of Izhar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> of Kohath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לֵוִ֖י <WH3878> of Levi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְאָחִ֣יו <WH251> And his brother אָסָ֔ף <WH623> Asaph הָעֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> who stood עַל־ <WH5921> at יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> on his right hand אָסָ֥ף <WH623> [even] Asaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖הוּ <WH1296> of Berachiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁמְעָֽא׃ <WH8092> of Shimea
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son מִיכָאֵ֥ל <WH4317> of Michael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בַּעֲשֵׂיָ֖ה <WH1202> of Baaseiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <WH4441> of Malchiah
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֶתְנִ֥י <WH867> of Ethni בֶן־ <WH1121> the son זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> of Zerah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲדָיָֽה׃ <WH5718> of Adaiah
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אֵיתָ֥ן <WH387> of Ethan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִמָּ֖ה <WH2155> of Zimmah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> of Shimei
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son יַ֥חַת <WH3189> of Jahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרְשֹׁ֖ם <WH1647> of Gershom בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi ס

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> the sons מְרָרִ֛י <WH4847> of Merari אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> And their brethren עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַשְּׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> [stood] on the left hand אֵיתָן֙ <WH387> Ethan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קִישִׁ֔י <WH7029> of Kishi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַבְדִּ֖י <WH5660> of Abdi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלּֽוּךְ׃ <WH4409> of Malluch
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son חֲשַׁבְיָ֥ה <WH2811> of Hashabiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמַצְיָ֖ה <WH558> of Amaziah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּֽה׃ <WH2518> of Hilkiah
בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son אַמְצִ֥י <WH557> of Amzi בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בָּנִ֖י <WH1137> of Bani בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָֽׁמֶר׃ <WH8106> of Shamer

בֶּן־ <WH1121> The son מַחְלִי֙ <WH4249> of Mahli בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> of Mushi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> of Merari בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi ס

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> Their brethren הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> also the Levites נְתוּנִ֕ים <WH5414> [were] appointed לְכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> for all עֲבוֹדַ֔ת <WH5656> unto all manner of service מִשְׁכַּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְֽאַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> But Aaron וּבָנָ֜יו <WH1121> and his sons מַקְטִירִ֨ים <WH6999> offered עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> upon the altar הָֽעוֹלָה֙ <WH5930> of the burnt offering וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> and on the altar הַקְּטֹ֔רֶת <WH7004> of incense לְכֹ֕ל <WH3605> for all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> [and were appointed] for all the work קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the [place] most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy וּלְכַפֵּר֙ <WH3722> and to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for Israel כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> had commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> according to all that Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> the servant הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God פ

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And these [are] the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> Eleazar בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son פִּֽינְחָ֥ס <WH6372> Phinehas בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲבִישׁ֥וּעַ <WH50> Abishua בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
בֻּקִּ֥י <WH1231> Bukki בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son עֻזִּ֥י <WH5813> Uzzi בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son זְרַֽחְיָ֥ה <WH2228> Zerahiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
מְרָי֥וֹת <WH4812> Meraioth בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <WH568> Amariah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲחִיט֥וּב <WH285> Ahitub בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
צָד֥וֹק <WH6659> Zadok בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲחִימַ֥עַץ <WH290> Ahimaaz בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son ס

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these מוֹשְׁבוֹתָ֔ם <WH4186> Now these [are] their dwelling places לְטִירוֹתָ֖ם <WH2918> throughout their castles בִּגְבוּלָ֑ם <WH1366> in their coasts לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> of the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron לְמִשְׁפַּחַ֣ת <WH4940> of the families הַקְּהָתִ֔י <WH6956> of the Kohathites כִּ֥י <WH3588> לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> theirs הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַגּוֹרָֽל׃ <WH1486> for theirs was the lot

וַֽיִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> And they gave לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> them Hebron בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִגְרָשֶׁ֖יהָ <WH4054> and the suburbs סְבִיבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5439> thereof round about
